description:
Kakuta is a dark-skinned man who is Class 1-2`s Physical and Health Education teacher. He resents http://anidb.net/ch79466 [Sakamoto] for his act of coming to school exactly on time before the bell rings, and by sliding in between his legs. His hair has a straight cut so perfect that it can be used as a substitute for a ruler.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kakuta-sensei
